ChocolateyBootstrapDsc.Name: Ensure
ChocolateyBootstrapDsc.Description: Says whether the Chocolatey software is installed on the machine.

ChocolateyBootstrapDsc.Name: Scope
ChocolateyBootstrapDsc.Description: Scope to install the provider. System wide or user scope

ChocolateyBootstrapDsc.Name: RunKey
ChocolateyBootstrapDsc.Description: Key to uniquely identify the configuration item.
